description:
The spec requires a third 'alternate' link (in addition to self and bookmark) that directs the user to the glance server an image is stored on.

See Examples 3.10/3.11:
http://docs.openstack.org/cactus/openstack-compute/developer/openstack-compute-api-1.1/content/LinksReferences.html
title: OSAPI v1.1 Alternate Image Links

comments.content:
